amendment.description: Amendment creates a process for Congress to review all rules currently in effect over a 10 year period.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 115-1 to create a process for Congress to review all rules currently in effect over a 10 year period.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 193 (Roll no. 21).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 193 (Roll no. 21).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. King (IA).
